channel.title: Slayer Tasks stuck at 0
channel.description:
Greetings.
Some of my players are experiencing issues with the slayer system. It seems (on certain tasks) when they complete them and try to get a new one, Kuradal says "You must complete your current slayer task to request a new one" and when they check how many are left to kill, it says "0". This seems to be an annoying glitch players are experiencing (it happens randomly) and I can't seem to figure out how to fix it.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Slayer Tasks stuck at 0
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Lanepker, post:3, topic:540168”]If you would like I could give you my Slayer File as it seems to be working 100% with no problem.[/quote]Don’t ask to help, help. Thank you in advance.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tasks stuck at 0
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

We have dealt with this before and to no avail I believe? Add a check to see if the task is 0 at the start of the dialogue block, if so trigger the method to give the player a new one.

Read full topic
